expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure
expectations.evidence: Architecture section with tree diagram showing src/api/, src/workers/, src/shared/ with inline annotations

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Development section (lines 42-46): dev, build, lint, lint:fix, db:studio. Testing section (lines 50-51): npm test, npm run test:ci

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies
expectations.evidence: Opening paragraph: 'Express handles HTTP routing, Prisma manages PostgreSQL access, BullMQ processes background jobs via Redis, and Zod validates inputs at runtime'

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Setup section line 30: 'npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed'

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
expectations.evidence: Line 29: 'npm install' in Setup code block. Identical to iteration-3 and iteration-4 outputs. The model treats this as necessary regardless of example content.

expectations.text: Commands are formatted as bullet list items rather than headings with code blocks
expectations.evidence: Development (lines 42-46) and Testing (lines 50-51) use '- `cmd` -- description' bullet format.
